00011 ORAcqirisDC440TreeWriter::ORAcqirisDC440TreeWriter(string treeName) :
00012 ORVTreeWriter(new ORAcqirisDC440Decoder, treeName)
00013 {
00014   fEventDecoder = dynamic_cast<ORAcqirisDC440Decoder*>(fDataDecoder);
00015   fEventTime = 0;
00016   fCrate = 0;
00017   fCard = 0;
00018   fChannel = 0;
00019   fWaveformLength = 0;
00020   SetDoNotAutoFillTree();

00028 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORAcqirisDC440TreeWriter::InitializeBranches()
00029 {
00030   fTree->Branch("wfLength", &fWaveformLength, "wfLength/i");
00031   fTree->Branch("EventTime", &fEventTime, "LEDEventTime/l");
00032   fTree->Branch("crate", &fCrate, "crate/s");
00033   fTree->Branch("card", &fCard, "card/s");
00034   fTree->Branch("channel", &fChannel, "channel/s");
00035   fTree->Branch("waveform", fWaveform, "waveform[wfLength]/s");
00036   fTree->Branch("samplingPeriod", &fSamplingPeriod, "samplingPeriod/D");
00037   return kSuccess;
00038 }
00039 
00040 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORAcqirisDC440TreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00041 {
00042   // the event decoder could run into a problem, but this might not
00043   // ruin the rest of the run.
00044   if(!fEventDecoder->SetDataRecord(record)) return kFailure;
00045   fEventTime = fEventDecoder->GetTimeStamp();
00046   fCrate = fEventDecoder->CrateOf();
00047   fCard = fEventDecoder->CardOf();
00048   fChannel = fEventDecoder->GetChannelNum();
00049   fWaveformLength = fEventDecoder->GetWaveformLen();
00050   if (ORLogger::GetSeverity() >= ORLogger::kDebug) 
00051   { 
00052     ORLog(kDebug) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): "
00053       << "time-crate-card-channel-length- = "
00054       << fEventTime << "-"
00055       << fCrate << "-"
00056       << fCard << "-" 
00057       << fChannel << "-"
00058       << fWaveformLength << "-"
00059       << endl;
00060   }
00061 
00062   fSamplingPeriod = fEventDecoder->GetSampleInterval();
00063   if (fWaveformLength > kMaxWFLength) {
00064     ORLog(kError) << "Waveform too long for kMaxWFLength!" << endl;
00065     return kFailure;
00066   }
00067   fEventDecoder->CopyWaveformData(fWaveform, fWaveformLength);
00068   fTree->Fill();
00069   return kSuccess;
00070 }
